pkgmetadata.longdescription: Leiden is a general algorithm for methods of community detection in large networks.Please refer to the `documentation <http://leidenalg.readthedocs.io/en/latest>`_for more details.The source code of this package is hosted at `GitHub <https://github.com/vtraag/leidenalg>`_.Issues and bug reports are welcome at https://github.com/vtraag/leidenalg/issues.
